mapper.update: update crm_action_log set `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_name = #{actionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_name = #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, action_id = #{actionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select log_id, `operator`, module_name, action_name, content, param_name, action_id, create_time, ip from crm_action_log where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select log_id, `operator`, module_name, action_name, content, param_name, action_id, create_time, ip from crm_action_log
